website_summaries.verdict: A heavy-duty pair of gloves that are designed to hold up during the tough jobs that can be damaging to your hands.
pros: The palms of these gloves are re-enforced with PVC for added durability while the EVA foam padding helps absorb vibrations and impact
The knuckle and fingertip guards feature thermal plastic rubber re-enforcement to help protect against abrasions and impact
cons: Once dirty, the gloves will not function with a touchscreen
Even while clean, the touchscreen feature can be unreliable

customer_reviews.title: The Best Gloves Yet
customer_reviews.text: These are the best gloves I've ever used and I've been through my fair share. I liked my first order so much I again ordered five pair. I've been an electrical contractor, carpenter, and landscaper for over 38 years. I've used these gloves while working in crawl spaces, attics, and while handling course, sharp rock for a day. These gloves are robust! Just so you know, a fantastic additional feature is that the fingertips are intentionally slightly slit so when you wash them the water drains from the tips, thus the gloves quickly dry. The price per pair is excellent. I give these gloves my highest recommendation. Keep up the great work, Vgo!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaving gloves!
customer_reviews.text: This review is for the gloves themselves, this order for 5 pairs, unfortunately never arrived. Had to order a 3 pair set in lieu. That being said, I've been using these gloves for about a year now, and must say they are great. I'm an electrician and usually work on live circuits, they may not be approved for this kind of service but they've never failed me. One pair usually give me 4 to 6 weeks of protection, depending on the work being done. These gloves literally saved my life in an accident involving two lids and 480V AC. I recommend these gloves to anyone in the trades.
customer_reviews.author: Julio A. Navarro

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the price of a single pair of the competion
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for summer riding gloves and then came across these gloves out of the blue. 5 Pair of summer riding gloves is what I am using these for and they work great with the TFT display on my motorcycle and the touch screen on my GPS. Can't go wrong with these. They are a little tight brand new. After a few hours of riding that works itself out. The protection offered withn these are just as good as anything I saw trying to compare with name brand riding gloves advertised as Motorcycle gloves. 5 pair for the price of one, don't let that stop you.
customer_reviews.author: Manshoon

customer_reviews.title: Gloves are great for working however don’t work with your touch screen ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased gloves to work with my phone. Tried to push apps and screens and anything to make it work. Gloves are great for working however don’t work with your touch screen at all. Do not recommend if your using it for touch screen capability. I don’t work
customer_reviews.author: quentin helland

customer_reviews.title: Nice pack of gloves
customer_reviews.text: Been using these for awhile no problems with them breaking apart, I've been cleaning the yard and using them to split wood also some automotive work they seem to be holding up and its a nice pack of five pairs fits good. I guess if you work hard everyday you will burn them up nothing last forever good deal just buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Edward L.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality work gloves.
customer_reviews.text: Impressive quality/value. Excellent fit & grip. I like the generous anti-vibe padding on the palm-(great you when you're running power equipment all day). Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sierrawoodsman

customer_reviews.title: Not as good for work as the medium duty.
customer_reviews.text: The plastic and padding don't really add much but chaff knuckles. Medium duty without it was more to my liking but as long as the price is the same they work for my job (medium is no longer in stock). I will be searching for a better replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality at a good price. I love these gloves. They will stretch after putting them on a few times so do not be too quick to call them too tight. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: IslandDaver

customer_reviews.title: Good price but ripped at thumb after a short time
customer_reviews.text: The price was good for the gloves but the first pair didnt last very long ripped at seam. I hope the 2nd pair is better.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Pittarelli

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty gloves kinda stiff rubber
customer_reviews.text: These are nice gloves. They were a little stiff and uncomfortable. They seem durable. I just couldn't wear them alot.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri0117

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Seems pretty good. We're using them for cutting/splitting about 6 cords of firewood
customer_reviews.author: P.R.O.

customer_reviews.title: Garbage!
customer_reviews.text: If your a supervisor looking to just look pretty.( like the bosses son) then these are for you. If your a real worker these gloves will last maybe a week per pair. Not worth it
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Quality of workmanship and great value when compared to other brands.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set 4 of these gloves about 3.5 months ago. As a business owner in the field of home renovation I wear gloves often. I especially need them when I'm on a roof or in an attic, looking for damage. These gloves are comparable in quality to those found in 'big box' home improvement stores that cost a min of $20 a pair. Unlike some other reviewers, I find the touch screen fingers to work extremely well. The gloves hold up well and I recommend these to anyone who needs good hand protection and still need access to touchscreen devices. Well worth the cost and very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Tony I.

customer_reviews.title: Decent gloves,not touchscreen compatable.
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty heavy duty gloves but they do not work with a touchscreen and I wouldnt call them high dexterity,good gloves for the money would have given 5 stars if they delivered on all the listed features.
customer_reviews.author: diy365

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: I have used them in the field and for home renovations. Work great, feel great and look even better! Merci.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Really nice gloves for doing yard work
customer_reviews.text: Really nice gloves for doing yard work. The rubber on the tops could be a little thinner, but I also understand I am using Mechanics gloves for yard work and not exactly their intended purpose. Gloves fit comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Zach P.

customer_reviews.title: More than good!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, employees love these gloves! I had a more expensive pare of gloves I used..then I tried these..just bought 40 more pair to keep I stick.a+
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: 5 pairs for the price of 1
customer_reviews.text: Great price for these gloves and you get 5 pairs
customer_reviews.author: Neko401

customer_reviews.title: Good glove
customer_reviews.text: Gloves have a good fight and feel. Hold up well for mechanics gloves. Armor on top of gloves works good without being obstructive.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Good protection AND electronics friendly
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty work gloves that allow easy use of electronics. Also using these for heavy gardening and they work really well to protect hands.
customer_reviews.author: J.  Dunn

customer_reviews.title: They are a great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband for when he rides his motorcycle. They are a great deal!! He loves these and they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: DeAnn Muth

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't by again for this job not sure if they are good for anything else
customer_reviews.text: Paid good money for these gloves and they are messed up after 5 uses
customer_reviews.author: Truckertom

customer_reviews.title: I liked the extra padding but these gloves do not hold ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked the extra padding but these gloves do not hold up as i have went through 2 pair in three weeks and i get a months wear out of a pair of medium duty vgo gloves
customer_reviews.author: Chris fell

customer_reviews.title: They are great for when he rides his motorcycle
customer_reviews.text: Mu husband absolutely loves these! They are great for when he rides his motorcycle.
customer_reviews.author: DeAnn Muth

customer_reviews.title: love the new gloves
customer_reviews.text: love the new gloves, perfect fit, very comfortable, comparable to or better than any other brand i have ever purchased, highest quality & absolutely the best price. i will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Floyd Walker Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cleaner hands
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my grandson who works at a local tire shop...he shared with me that the gloves helps to protect his knuckles...and I'm happy that he comes home with cleaner hands...hehe
customer_reviews.author: ladytahoe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Feel great only time will tell how well they hold up
customer_reviews.author: penstar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Feel good only time will tell how well they hold up
customer_reviews.author: penstar

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty and Good Fit
customer_reviews.text: Good Fit and heavy duty. We use them for tire work. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ed F

customer_reviews.title: Better than most!
customer_reviews.text: I am hard on gloves. I have had gloves only last one day before wearing through. These are better then most and that is why I bought them a second time.
customer_reviews.author: Cole A. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are just as good as the Mechanix gloves
customer_reviews.author: Chris P.

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Fits good, good quality holds up to heat pretty well if torch cutting. Price is great. Only negative is dexterity is still a little thick for threading nuts and bolts together. Over all great product and will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Missing gloves
customer_reviews.text: *rating change*. I've ordered these gloves before(3-pack), in the wrong size and I still loved them. This time ordered the 5-pack and some gloves were missing from the pack. I only received 3 pair and one stand alone glove............ spoke with the seller and they have sent me the missing pair and more. Completely satisfied and they have gained a long term customer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Glove
customer_reviews.text: I order these on an ongoing basis and really like them.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: PRODUCTS WERE DAMAGED
customer_reviews.text: After 1 week of using pulling wires, all the pieces were damages, the middle finger was cut. These gloves are not good
customer_reviews.author: PARIS P.

customer_reviews.title: great gloves at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Gloves fit great, and are a great value for the money. Best to buy in bulk. Be nice to know how to clean
customer_reviews.author: Jon-Paul Mangarin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very goid gloves, fit and performance wise you get your moneys worth plus some.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great price and great quality
customer_reviews.text: I love these gloves for work and for riding motorcycles and the price is awesome
customer_reviews.author: Scott J.

customer_reviews.title: Dependable glove
customer_reviews.text: Love these gloves! Makes mechanic work and heavy lifting a breeze especially in the oil field! It's definitely a heavy duty glove!
customer_reviews.author: Lee DeLong Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Might buy again
customer_reviews.text: Fine gloves at a good price. My husband is hard on them so mulitpack is great.
customer_reviews.author: rachel peetz

customer_reviews.title: Nice gloves
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used gloves yet but tried them on and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jason H.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and great price
customer_reviews.text: Gloves fit right and look pretty tough, it is very hard to find this quality in Home Depot or Lowes for such a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Tucker099

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good gloves. I've paid twice the price for half of the quality as these.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Vgo 5-Pairs Heavy-Duty Synthetic Leather Work Gloves, Impact Protection Mechanic Gloves, Rigger Gloves, High Dexterity, Vibration Reduction, Touchscreen Capable (Size L, Black, SL8849)
feature_bullets: VERSATILE APPLICATIONS - Perfect for power tools, construction, motorcycling, tactical and DIY heavy-duty works that require higher protection
IMPACT & VIBRATION REDUCTION - 3D-structured PVC patches on the back for great impact protection; High dexterity EVA padding offering stereoscopic vibration
180° COVERED FINGERTIPS W/3D CUTTING - 45° angle cut at the finger junctions and pre-curved fingers ensure a tailored fit with amazing flexibility, breathability & comfort
TOUCHSCREEN COMPATIBLE & SWEAT WIPING - Touchscreen capable thumb & index fingertips for smartphone control; Soft terry cloth with strong sweat absorption
Machine washable for easy cleaning & maintenance

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars162 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
